Class Rider

    public class Rider
extends User
    A Singleton controller class for Rider activities.

      • instantiate

        public static void instantiate(Profile p)
        Creates an instance of Rider using a user's Profile. Meant to be called during login. Must be called before other Rider methods are used.
        Parameters:
        p - The user's profile.

      • makeRequest

        public Request makeRequest(java.lang.String description,
                  Location startPoint,
                  Location destination,
                  double price)
        Makes a new Request and sends it to the database.
        Parameters:
        description - User-entered description of the Request.
        startPoint - User-selected starting Location.
        destination - User-selected ending Location.
        price - User-entered price.
        Returns:
        The Request just made.
